description:
Walking to work and hiking Lynn canyon shouldn’t require 2 socks. This is where the athletic crew socks come in. With their 2 degree fit, reinforced sole and flat knit toes, you can wear these socks anywhere your feet can take you.

  • Merino and nylon blend keeps things breathable, odour resistant and comfortable for every trip
  • 2 degree fit system has elastic arch and ankle support to keep your socks in place for longer
  • Flat knit toe seam allows your toes to move with less friction
  • Reinforced sole adds durability and protection for when you’re on your feet all-day
name: Smartwool Athletic Stripe Crew Socks - Unisex
